column1: Senator Capito visited the West Virginia Capitol this week and gave legislative updates to the House and Senate Republican caucuses. They discussed goings on in Washington and how they can continue to work together for success in Charleston and Washington. https://t.co/KNkxb60tGB

A lot has been accomplished over the last five years. I’m proud to file for reelection today based on my record of delivering for families and communities across our state. #provenconservative #capito2020 https://t.co/pbcy0WozMW https://t.co/NqGMlCgdDM
Senator Shelley Moore Capito with help from two of her grandkids shared an important message with voters after filing for reelection. #provenconservative #capito2020 https://t.co/gEhWsYUEbl

I’m forever humbled by the confidence you placed in me. I look forward to traveling the state in the months to come & campaigning on my record. Working together we can win big in 2020 & deliver even better results in the years to come. #provenconservative #capito2020 https://t.co/83Nqoh1I5f
Senator Shelley Moore Capito will officially file for reelection today. Take a moment to hear from her. #provenconservative #capito2020 https://t.co/tk12LWO2vo

Thank you to the members of @ChamberAlerts (HuntPAC) for your confidence in me. I’m honored to have your endorsement. We've made a lot of progress turning our state’s economy around. I stand ready to work with you in the years to come. https://t.co/NZ9IkAFGIK
